text: Mint is a flavor frequently used in candy, chewing gum and ice cream. Famous brands of mints include Polos (made by Rowntrees, then Nestl√©), Altoids, Cadburys After Dinner Mints, Fisherman's Friends, Trebor extra strong mints, Menthos and Wrigleys spearmint gum, also with Mentos Mints. ==Other websites== *The Trebor story *Fisherman's Friends * Polos * Mentos Category:Candy
title: Mint (candy)
